alert.note: Alert for Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 07 at 8:38PM MDT by NWS Billings
info.description: ...Strong wind gusts from showers and thunderstorms will impact portions of northeastern Stillwater, central Carbon and southwestern Yellowstone Counties through 930 PM MDT... At 836 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong wind gusts from showers and thunderstorms along a line extending from 7 miles east of Big Timber to near Absarokee to 7 miles southwest of Red Lodge. Movement was east-northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and areas of blowing dust. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Sudden strong wind gusts will likely arrive before precipitation or thunder. Blowing dust may reduce visibility below a mile at times. Locations impacted include... Red Lodge, Columbus, Laurel, Bridger, Joliet, Fromberg, Absarokee, Bearcreek, Reed Point, Halfbreed Lake Wildlife, Edgar, Belfry, Silesia, Cooney Reservoir State Park, Park City, Rockvale, Washoe, Luther, Boyd and Hailstone Wildlife Refuge. This advisory does not include the city of Billings. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Absaroka, Beartooth Mountains; Northern Carbon; Northern Stillwater; Red Lodge Foothills; Southeastern Carbon; Southwestern Yellowstone
